data.text: @BangbangbangZ98 Oh my gawd that's the most ridiculous thing I've heard about mask wearing yet.

@Laskinator2 It actually does the opposite if you do your research. It doesn’t allow you to get certain bacteria we need to survive, so when you DO get hit with anything other than Covid, you won’t be ready for it.
@Laskinator2 @OttawaHealth Go nuts dude... You do you.

@10dollarstud @OttawaHealth What is it with the obsession with fear with you people? Yeah, I don't want to get sick. I can't afford to take time off, and being sick sucks ass. So yeah, I'll keep wearing a mask. Why should you care?
@LouiseRobb19 @OttawaHealth We shouldn't have to read between the lines. It should be clear. What is clear is that Dr. Etches just wants to get back to "normal" urgently.

@OttawaHealth I used to be proud of you folks, and feel like I was living in a city that had the best possible people working to keep us safe.

After the urgency of normal/living with Covid white flags, that is no longer the case. Just remember that you gave up on us before we gave up on you.

@OttawaHealth Lift it all. And never, ever try to mandate this crap again. So much harm. So many people affected who should not have been. All for a media hysteria driven pseudo pandemic. 
Public Health, ‘Government’, Don’t call me, i’ll call you.
@OttawaHealth Hey @VeraEtches you have No credibility left, it's time to take your final bow, look for the closest exit and disappear #Ottawa
